TragicServers is a game and voice server provider founded in May 2012 with a goal to provide high-end customer support, quality and lowest pricing possible. We’re proud to host 500+ satisfied customers across the US and EU. Currently, we provide game servers and voice servers in Chicago, Dallas, San Jose, New York and Frankfurt.

After more than a year of quality service, we’re now expanding our services to include VPS hosting. VPS servers are perfect for those who run many online services and wish to have complete control over their machine for a budget price.

As of right now, we currently have our VPS services located in Dallas, TX (Limestone Networks) with the following features:

  • Unmanaged Service
  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • OpenVZ Virtualization
  • Upgradable RAM/HDD space
  • Additional IPv4 addresses available
  • Multiple OS Installations (CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, etc.)
  • VSwap
  • Instant Setup
  • 1 Gbps Port
